title: Scenario: User has 'Show selected game status in menu bar' checked
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the General tab
custom_steps:
When the user has 'Show selected game status in menu bar' checked
And the user has a game selected
custom_expected:
Then the game status will appear in the menu bar for that game
![](index.php?/attachments/get/692)

title: Scenario: User has 'Show selected game status in menu bar' unchecked
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the General tab
custom_steps:
When the user has 'Show selected game status in menu bar' unchecked
And the user has a game selected
custom_expected:
Then the game status will not appear in the menu bar for that game
![](index.php?/attachments/get/693)

title: Scenario: User has 'Hide scores for all games' checked
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the General tab
custom_steps:
When the user has 'Hide scores for all games' checked
And the user navigates through the app
custom_expected:
Then no where in the app on today's or previous days dates should the user see the resulting scores of games
And the user should not see any indication on scoreboards or otherwise that a game went into extra innings

title: Scenario: User has 'Hide scores for all games' unchecked
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the General tab
custom_steps:
When the user has 'Hide scores for all games' unchecked
And the user navigates through the app
custom_expected: Then the app will show scores for today's or previous days dates

title: Scenario: User has 'Enable closed captioning' checked
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the General tab
custom_steps:
When the user has 'Enable closed captioning' checked
And the user accesses an MLB.tv stream
custom_expected:
Then closed captioning will appear when available
And the CC button will be highlighted in the video player controls

title: Scenario: User has 'Enable closed captioning' unchecked
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the General tab
custom_steps:
When the user has 'Enable closed captioning' unchecked
And the user accesses an MLB.tv stream
custom_expected:
Then closed captioning will not appear when available
And the CC button will not be highlighted in the video player controls

title: Scenario: User accesses Accounts tab while logged in**
Scenario: User accesses Teams tab
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the Teams tab
custom_steps: When the user views the teams tab
custom_expected:
Then the teams will be sorted alphabetically by league
And all the team names will appear correctly with no spelling errors
And all the team logos will appear correctly for retina/non-retina devices
And each team will have a check-box next to it's logo that can be toggled

title: Scenario: User accesses Teams tab without previously having set a favorite team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the Teams tab
custom_steps:
When the user has not previously set a favorite team
And the teams tap opens
custom_expected:
Then there will be no teams with check-marks next to them
And no teams will not be sorted to the top of the Scoreboard EPG out of normal scoreboard sort
And no teams will be notated by a star
And the default TV/audio stream will always play when a new feed is launched

title: Scenario: User accesses Teams tab after previously having set a favorite team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the Teams tab
custom_steps:
When the user has previously set a favorite team
And the teams tap opens
custom_expected:
Then all favorite teams will have check-marks next to them
And the favorite teams will be sorted to the top of the Scoreboard EPG
And the favorite teams will be notated by a star
And the favorite teams TV/Audio stream will play by default even when the favorite team is the away team

title: Scenario: User changes favorite teams and completely exits application
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the Teams tab
custom_steps:
When the user makes changes in the settings of their favorite teams
And the user exits the application by completely quitting
When the user relaunches the app 
And the user has accessed the preferences menu
And the user has selected the Teams tab
custom_expected: Then the favorite team selections that have been made will be stored correctly

title: Scenario: User has favorite teams set and navigates back to app ***How is order determined?
